From Mockup to Market: My End-to-End Product Design Process
A curated list of my most significant projects and scripts, showcasing my skills and expertise.

Artly is a creative mobile application designed to help artists maintain a consistent drawing practice through AI-generated prompts and gamification. Inspired by Duolingo's successful streak mechanics, Artly encourages users to draw daily, track their progress, and share their artwork with a supportive community.
AI-generated creative prompts to inspire daily artwork
Themed challenges to explore different subjects and styles
Reference images to help guide your creative process
Track your consecutive days of drawing
Visual progress indicators showing weekly completion
Gamified experience that rewards daily practice
Share your daily drawings with fellow artists
Browse and appreciate others' interpretations of the same prompts
Like and engage with community artwork
Visual timeline of your artistic journey

Artly focuses on making creativity a daily habit rather than an occasional pursuit. By removing the barrier of "what should I draw?", the app helps artists focus on the practice itself. The social aspect creates accountability and inspiration, while the streak mechanic taps into the same motivational psychology that makes language learning apps successful.
Currently in active development, Artly represents a collaboration between developers passionate about fostering creativity through technology.

A mobile platform where users receive AI-generated drawing prompts, create drawings daily, and log their artistic progress with a Duolingo-style streak mechanic. Users can share their drawings and connect with a creative community.

Bellus is a comprehensive multi-tenant platform designed for beauty professionals, salons, and spa groups. The platform enables service inventory management, client capture and nurturing, appointment scheduling, document and media management, and marketing-facing website publishing with embeddable widgets.
: Led the complete redesign of the web application, implementing modern UI/UX patterns and ensuring responsive design across all devices
: Ongoing maintenance and feature development for the internal dashboard (Nuxt-based cloud application)
: Created complete RESTful and gRPC endpoints following Domain-Driven Design principles
: Built the entire auto-web application with complete implementation across cloud, backend, and frontend for dynamically generated client marketing sites
: Improved the embeddable widget with better user experience and functionality
: Implemented comprehensive SEO strategies including meta tags, structured data, and performance optimization
: Developed i18n support across multiple applications, enabling English, Spanish, and Catalan localizations
: Built comprehensive client relationship management system with customer history, notes, and nurturing workflows
: Implemented service portfolio management with pricing, availability states, and media attachments
: Developed scheduling system with availability management and conflict detection
Unified platform for beauty and wellness businesses with service inventory management, client CRM, appointment scheduling, and marketing site distribution

Carsworkflow is a comprehensive multi-tenant platform designed for professional car detailers. The platform enables appointment scheduling, service catalog definition, customer management, invoicing, payments, notifications, analytics, and marketing-facing website publishing with embeddable widgets.
: Implemented calendar management with conflict detection, opening hours, and service durations
: Built comprehensive service management with pricing, durations, and availability
: Developed customer relationship management with history, notes, and nurturing workflows
: Created invoicing system with expense tracking and document generation
: Integrated Stripe for payment processing and webhook handling
: Set up multi-channel notifications including email (SMTP), SMS/WhatsApp (Twilio), and optional Slack alerts
: Developed auto-generated public marketing sites and embeddable booking widget
: Built KPIs and dashboard endpoints for portfolio and engagement metrics
: Designed Domain-Driven Design with gRPC and REST gateway, using Watermill for event-driven side-effects
: Developed multiple Nuxt/Vue applications including dashboard, marketing site, and booking widget
Unified platform for automotive businesses with vehicle inventory management, lead CRM, appointment scheduling, and marketing site distribution

GitHub Scraper UI is a web application that provides an intuitive interface for analyzing GitHub network connections. By connecting to the GitHub Scraper API, it allows users to visualize their GitHub followers and following relationships, making it easy to identify mutual connections and understand their developer network.
Search and analyze any GitHub profile
View comprehensive follower and following lists
Real-time data fetching from the API
Identify mutual connections at a glance
Hosted on Vercel for optimal performance
for a dynamic user experience, the application consumes the GitHub Scraper API to retrieve and display network data. The frontend is deployed on
, ensuring fast global access and seamless deployment workflows.

The UI acts as the frontend companion to the GitHub Scraper API, providing a visual layer that makes complex network data easy to understand and interact with. It demonstrates effective API consumption and modern frontend development practices.
: Quickly identify valuable connections in your GitHub network
: Understand who engages with your work
: Track and grow your developer relationships
: Gain insights into GitHub social patterns

A powerful GitHub Profile UI that connects to the GitHub Scraper API to analyze profiles, followers, and following, identifying mutual connections to provide valuable insights into your GitHub network.

GitHub Scraper API is a backend service designed to help developers understand their GitHub network by analyzing profile connections. Using web scraping techniques with Puppeteer, the API extracts data about a user's followers and following, then performs analysis to identify mutual connections and network patterns.
Export network data for further analysis
as the web framework, the API leverages
for headless browser automation to scrape GitHub pages. This approach allows for reliable data extraction while maintaining compatibility with GitHub's dynamic content loading.
: Identify active members in your network
The project demonstrates practical application of web scraping techniques, RESTful API design, and asynchronous JavaScript programming patterns.

A powerful API built with JavaScript, Express, and Puppeteer that analyzes GitHub profiles, followers, and following to identify mutual connections. A useful tool for understanding and mapping your GitHub network relationships.

Inventory Management System is a full-featured web application built for a local business to efficiently manage their inventory operations. The system provides a complete solution for tracking products, managing stock levels, processing sales, and generating detailed reports. Built with PHP 7 and utilizing the AdminLTE template, it offers a professional and user-friendly interface for daily business operations.
The complete source code is available as a public repository on GitHub, showcasing clean code organization and professional development practices.
A complete web-based inventory management system for local businesses featuring QR code scanning, sales tracking, user roles management, and comprehensive reporting capabilities.

QRs Factory is a comprehensive QR code lifecycle management platform designed for businesses and marketing professionals who need to create, manage, version, and analyze QR codes at scale. The platform provides a complete solution for QR code campaigns, from initial creation through dynamic versioning to detailed analytics tracking. Built with modern technologies and following a multi-tenant architecture, it enables teams to manage multiple campaigns with sophisticated redirect logic, metadata enrichment, and optional AI-assisted content generation.
: Implemented dynamic QR code creation with multiple format support and customization options
: Created intelligent routing system with rules engine for conditional redirects based on user context
: Implemented role-based permissions with team collaboration features
: Integrated cloud storage for QR code images, campaign assets, and related media
: Created public-facing website with SEO optimization and product showcase

Modern QR lifecycle platform for creating, managing, versioning, and analyzing QR codes & campaigns with multi-tenant dashboard, dynamic redirect logic, metadata enrichment, and AI-assisted content generation.

RealtyWeb is a comprehensive multi-tenant platform designed for real estate professionals, agencies, and broker groups. The platform enables property inventory management, lead capture and nurturing, viewing appointment scheduling, document and media management, and marketing-facing website publishing with embeddable widgets.
: Implemented Google Maps across the application, cloud dashboard, and web for property location visualization
Unified platform for real estate businesses with property inventory management, lead CRM, appointment scheduling, and marketing site distribution

Trader-Buddy is a comprehensive trading performance and journaling platform designed to help active traders record, enrich, and analyze their trading activities. The platform combines real-time market data collection with detailed trade logging, broker report ingestion, and sophisticated performance analytics to enable data-driven trading decisions.
: Developed complete Nuxt 3 single-page application with Vue 3, Pinia state management, and chart visualization
: Built Go-based gRPC service with REST gateway for comprehensive trading data management
: Implemented WebSocket (WSS) endpoints for live market data retrieval and monitoring
: Created automated IBKR TLG report ingestion system for bulk trade data import
: Developed on-demand calculators for win rates, profit factors, Kelly %, drawdowns, and distribution analytics
: Built multi-series categorical charts (hour-of-day, duration ranges, price/volume tiers, P&L evolution)
: Implemented daily profit/loss summaries and trade count tracking
: Developed Base64 upload system with DigitalOcean Spaces storage for screenshots, PDFs, and video clips
: Integrated RSS feed processing with OpenAI filtering for market intelligence (70% accuracy threshold)
: Set up multi-channel notifications via Slack webhooks
: Implemented Firebase Auth with platform JWT issuance and impersonation support
